ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s
do something fun together today!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2101_02_10: What do you think? Is it useful?
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2102_02_10: Are you happy? Hee hee, I got to see you smile!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
This is a special present from me to you!
Please accept it!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2103_03_10: that makes me super happy too!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
There’s so much I want to talk to you about,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Listen, this happened
to me recently...
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Is this for me? Thank you!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
You better look forward to what you’ll get
in return!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2402_01_10: That was so fun! Let’s talk again sometime!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Hee hee, we talked so much, and I had so
much fun!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s talk
again sometime!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
Seems like this place is used by many people
to relax.
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
It’d be nice if everyone gathered here could do
something fun together.
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
If I come up with a good idea, I’ll make sure to
tell you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
It’s difficult to perfectly predict and control the
natural forces...like the wind or the weather.
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But how you use that power to your advantage
shows your skills as a pilot!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
When you’re one with the wind, you can have the
perfect flight!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8003_0701_01_10: Flying is fun for many reasons...
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
But the number one reason is that you can see so
far when you’re high up!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
If I kept on flying higher and higher, I wonder
what kind of scenery would be below me!
ch0016_00_huuro_salon/8003_0701_04_10: I hope one day I can fly to the top of the world!
